title: Rock Band Percussion (PC Edition)
description:
When the squirrel gods demand something, you must obey.	    

+==============================================================+																
||                                                            ||
||                         ROCK BAND                          ||
||                                                            ||
||                    PERCUSSION EDITION                      ||
||                     beta release 0.5                       ||
||                                                            ||
+==============================================================+																
||                                                            ||
||         Thank you for taking the time to download          ||
||                                                            ||
+==============================================================+																
||                                                            ||
|| The Squirrel Gods love to play RockBand. There is no       ||
|| secret there. We are also bummed that there isn't a PC     ||
|| version of the game. This is why we stepped up and made    ||
|| one that works with the XBOX RockBand Drumset Controller   ||
||                                                            ||
|| The engine is DTXMania with some graphic changes.          ||
||                                                            ||
|| All of the songs were found online, already converted to   ||
|| the dtx/gda format. We have gone through and updated some  ||
|| menus, and made the feel more like RockBand.               ||
||                                                            ||
|| DTXMania supports the ability to adjust difficulty. Change ||
|| scroll and play rates, dark mode, reverse mode, hidden,    ||
|| sudden, tight mode, auto hit, and much much more.          ||
||                                                            ||
|| All of the games include the standard Easy, Medium, Hard,  ||
|| & Expert modes. Plus a bonus REAL mode which is awesome    ||
|| and is for a full drum kit. The RockBand Drum Kit will     ||
|| NOT work for Real without disabling the extra tracks.      ||
|| The Real version includes hi-hat, symbol, crash, floor     ||
|| tom and other new-to-rockband targets.                     ||
||                                                            ||
|| Guitar, Bass and Vocals are not supported in this version. ||
||                                                            ||
|| All in all, this is the perfect tool to practice on!       ||
|| Your friends will wonder how you know the songs so well!   ||
||                                                            ||
|| Beware of the risks... or possible benefits.               ||
||                                                            ||
|| Please read INSTALL.txt and thank you for downloading!!    ||
||                                                            ||
||                                        -The Squirrel Gods  ||
||                                                            ||
+==============================================================+																


 The initial seeding may take a while but please hang in there!
